channel.title: Ec on Running on R
channel.description: Recent content in Ec on Running on R

item.title: Running R on an AWS Enstance
item.description: Benefits of using Amazon’s EC2 service with R Launching an EC2 Instance Short and Easy Installation Detailed, longer yet more flexible installation Logging in to your RStudio from anywhere Using RStudio’s system terminal to install MySQL Wrapping it all up Amazon Web Services with R In my previous post Databases in the Cloud, I went over some of the benefits Amazon Web Services has to offer. Amazon EC2 is just another great service offered by Amazon.
